item.description:
Explore woods and fields by the light of the Halloween Hunter's Moon!

Join us on a clear and crisp Halloweeny evening. We'll explore Kingman Farm's extensive network of trails by the light of the almost-full hunter's moon. And of course we'll go for food and drinks afterward!

Bring a headlamp or flashlight (but keep it turned off as much as possible). You can also bring glow sticks or reflective tape to look spooky in the dark.

The pace will be leisurely - a moonlight walk, not run. Time and distance will depend on the group but figure on no more than a couple of hours.

After party @ The Farm Bar & Grille -25A Portland Ave. Dover, NH!

Weather: Rain could cancel and I will email & post on this site if it looks wet. However, since we won't have other plans made, we'll still get together for food.

No pets, please.

Moonrise: 3:59 pm  Sunset: 5:41pm - The waxing moon will be 93% full.

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in this event is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: The Original Moonlight, Friday-Night Glow Hike!
